alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued November 24 at 3:54PM HST until November 26 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND... .Surf along exposed north and west facing shores will remain above warning levels through Saturday as a large northwest swell slowly lowers. A gradual downward trend will occur over the weekend, with heights falling below advisory levels by the end of the day Sunday. ...HIGH SURF WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Surf 25 to 35 feet through Saturday, lowering 20 to 25 feet by late Saturday. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal impacts with periodic overtopping of the roadways late tonight into Saturday morning during high tide times.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.
